class.name: MeasuringProgramEntity
class.comment: Storage of the measuring program which describes a measurement campaign and summarizes all sampling, time series, etc.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the measuring program which would be the ORDER_ID in the output of the REST API.

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name or label of the sampling.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the measuring program

column.name: producer
column.comment: The producer of the measuring program, e.g. name of a person or an organization

column.name: measuring_time_start
column.comment: The timestamp when the measuring program period has started.

column.name: measuring_time_end
column.comment: The timestamp when the measuring program period has finished.

set.name: datasets
set.comment: Storage of relations between dataset and related measuring programs

column.name: fk_measuring_program_id
column.comment: The reference to the measuring program.

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: The reference to the dataset in the dataset table

column.name: fk_measuring_program_id
column.comment: Reference to the measuring program table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the measuring program entity

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the measuring program entity
